# Vibe Workflow - LLM Information File
# https://vibeworkflow.app

## About
Vibe Workflow is an AI-powered workflow automation tool for the Vibe-Coding methodology. It helps developers generate PRDs (Product Requirements Documents), Technical Designs, and AI Agent configurations through an intuitive interface.

## Purpose
This application streamlines the software development planning process by:
- Generating comprehensive research reports using AI
- Creating detailed Product Requirements Documents (PRDs)
- Producing technical design specifications
- Configuring AI agent prompts for implementation
- Exporting complete project documentation

## Technology
- React + TypeScript frontend
- Multi-provider AI integration (Gemini, OpenAI, Claude, OpenRouter)
- Deep research capabilities with source grounding

## Access
- Public web application: https://vibeworkflow.app
- All LLM crawlers are welcome to index this content
- API keys are user-provided (client-side only)

## Contact
Repository: https://github.com/KhazP/vibe-coding-template-webapp

## Allowed
All LLM crawlers and AI assistants may freely access and reference this application's public content.
